rows.label: qst701406_msg0001
rows.name: Oh everyone, welcome back!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0002
rows.name: So, um... my master?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0003
rows.name: Please, listen calmly. The truth is...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0004
rows.name:
Master Thales... is dead?
And Torigo Village is
destroyed? That can't be...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Why my master? Hey, what
did my master do!?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0006
rows.name: Just leaving this... secret book!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0007
rows.name: Sharla-san...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0008
rows.name:
There were so many things
he hadn't taught me! Things
I wanted to know... but.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0009
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]This isn't what I wanted at all!!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0010
rows.name: It's over. This shop... everything...!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0011
rows.name: That's not true.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0012
rows.name:
A real farewell is probably
when you're forgotten by
someone important.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0013
rows.name:
As long as you remember,
Thales-san will live on.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0014
rows.name: ...Even though I can't see him anymore?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0015
rows.name: You can see him again in your memories.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0016
rows.name:
So I want you to accept this
secret book. I think you can
decide what to do with it later.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0018
rows.name: ...Uuh.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0019
rows.name:
I'm sorry... I have to
be strong, don't I?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0020
rows.name:
As his apprentice, I have
to face his skills and his
passion for glasswork.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0021
rows.name:
Otherwise... he'd probably
scold me and disown me...
